document.full_text: global miner rio tinto  beat its target to secure a 47 percent stake in riversdale mining  with its a$3.9 billion ($4 billion) takeover offer, and will pay its sweetened offer.
document.title: rio tinto secures 49.49% stake in $4 billion bid for riversdale
lines_and_colors: global miner rio tinto  beat its target to secure a 47 percent stake in riversdale mining  with its a$3.9 billion ($4 billion) takeover offer, and will pay its sweetened offer.
